definition: at fault/blamed for/responsible (for a blunder or crime)
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: Management of the firm culpable for its losses will be terminated.
sentences.chinese: 對公司虧損負有責任的管理層將被撤職。

sentences.english: Both firms deny any responsibility for the tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 兩家公司都否認對這一慘禍負有責任。

sentences.english: Mr Tourre was responsible for the CDO, known as ABACUS.
sentences.chinese: 以神機妙算而聞名的圖雷先生對於CDO負有責任。

sentences.english: UL-STR shall not be held responsible for these risks, which are out of its control.
sentences.chinese: 乙方不對此等超出乙方控制範圍的風險負有責任。

sentences.english: These are online communities that come with commitments too.
sentences.chinese: 這些也都是你對之負有責任的網絡社區。

sentences.english: FAO as an institution should be held responsible.
sentences.chinese: 糧農組織作爲一個機構應當負有責任。

sentences.english: In my view, he is culpable for four goals so far.
sentences.chinese: 依我看來，至今爲止他應對四粒失球負有責任。

sentences.english: I am to blame for his lateness.
sentences.chinese: 我對他的遲到負有責任。

sentences.english: But Pyongyang denies it is responsible for the attack.
sentences.chinese: 但是平壤否認對那次襲擊負有責任。

sentences.english: We all take responsibility for that.
It isn't the players, but the supporters, that are responsible for football hooliganism .
sentences.chinese: 不僅是選手，支持者對足球流氓行爲也都有負有責任。

sentences.english: Both of you will hold each other accountable to your goals and plans.
sentences.chinese: 你們互相對達到你們的目標和計劃負有責任。

sentences.english: Acknowledge your role in it so you can avoid repeating it.
sentences.chinese: 承認你對婚姻失敗負有責任，從而避免重蹈覆轍。

sentences.english: I think they are responsible for large-scale human miseries in Pakistan.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲他們對巴基斯坦的大規模人類慘劇負有責任。

sentences.english: He should be responsible for that.
sentences.chinese: 他應該對此事負有責任。

sentences.english: Assemblers should be held accountable for completing their tasks properly.
sentences.chinese: 裝配工應該對正確地完成他們的任務負有責任。
